code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import FileUpload from'../components/FileUpload';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UploadPage=()=>{const[uploadStatus,setUploadStatus]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleFileUploaded=fileName=>{setUploadStatus(`文件 ${fileName} 上传成功!`);setTimeout(()=>{navigate(`/chat/${fileName}`);},2000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-8 text-center text-gray-800",children:"\u4E0A\u4F20 PDF \u6587\u4EF6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileUpload,{onFileUploaded:handleFileUploaded}),uploadStatus&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-4 text-green-600 text-center",children:uploadStatus})]})]})});};export default UploadPage;
